posts.post_title: FS: Bresnahan American Beauty & Keeler *MOVED TO EBAY*
posts.post_content:
The following graded T206s are for sale. PayPal, check, money order, cash. 

STILL AVAILABLE
Bresnahan - [url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/221530893336[/url]
Keeler - [url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/321500253089[/url]

SOLD!
Tinker (pins) - *SOLD*
McGraw - *SOLD*

[IMG]http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/t206-Tinker-Bat-Off-Shoulder-Sweet-Caporal-350-PSA-2-sold.jpg[/IMG]

Jason,

If you are OK with regular PayPal, with 3% added, I will take McGraw for $103.  Please let me know where to send payment.

Best regards,

Eric

[quote name="Eric72" post=1302255]Jason,

If you are OK with regular PayPal, with 3% added, I will take McGraw for $103.  Please let me know where to send payment.

Best regards,

Eric[/QUOTE]

Yes, that's fine. I sent you a PM with the details. Thanks!
McGraw sold. Others still available. Thanks!
Prices have been reduced on remaining cards.

Tinker is sold, thanks!

Bresnahan & Keeler remain...

Better scans added for the two remaining cards. 

Bresnahan has a crease that runs from the top of the card above his hat down to his armpit and has some wrinkles in the top right.

Keeler obviously has several creases and paper loss on the front.
All prices further reduced. Looking to move both ASAP. Thank you! :)
